Text: Do you have the serial of this game? It prompted me that if you don't have a serial, the game progress can't be saved. If you can post the serial of this game, I will be very appreciate, thx

Golf5133:

hey just create a local profile on windows live...that 
1)run the game
2)click sign in
3)create a profile
4)scrol down you must see the create local profile
5)finish create 
6)after that you can save your data well
